name: pyljpost.vim
description:
A couple of vim macro along with the simple Livejournal poster written in python. Macros include syntax
file for livejournal posts, templatabiliy, multiple journals and a couple of other minor features. Together this makes a simple vim-oriented livejournal client for those who doesn't like to leave their favourite editor.
install_details: Installation is completely by hand now, though pretty easy, and described in included README file.
